ygData.subject: RE: Charm (was: Karana Lambent Trading)
ygData.msgSnippet: Try it on yourself.  Most of the time you will get the you send forth music message and icon, but will not be stunned. If you wait for the icon to
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Try it on yourself. Most of the time you will get the "you
send forth music" message and icon, but will not be stunned.
If you wait for the icon to disappear, you will get the "you
are no longer stunned" message even though you were never
stunned!

It *is* broken.
<snip>

it is not broken! I used it in lguk 2 days ago. We were over swarm by 3
mobs. So I used pixie strike on one of them and he was standing still for
10 second then started wacking again. Then I sang pixie again then it stop.
The thing is you must stop fighting it and back off for the song to work.
But it seems the duration is very unpredictable but the songs works. I
also tried it on HG and it works too. When I was in Rathe Mtn, I
accidentally pull 2 so I pixie on 1 and ran by real fast and it just stood
there and eventually I lost the HG. it does work but not very reliable.
You just have to keep doing it.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Bad Apple, The Rathe
